tool.name: Convert a LIF document to PubAnnotation JSON format
tool.help:
**What it does**
Converts a document wrapped as `LIF <http://wiki.lappsgrid.org/org.lappsgrid.serialization/groovydoc/org/lappsgrid/serialization/lif/Container.html>`_ to the `PubAnnotation JSON format <http://www.pubannotation.org/docs/annotation-format/>`_.
.. class:: infomark
**NOTE:** This tool is currently intended for development and testing only.
